attributes.action: Let all girls at secondary school have the cervical cancer injection in year 8,9,10,11
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should this preventative cervical cancer injection only be given to age 12 girls only,other children of school age should have the right to have this also.
It should be given to all girls at secondary school as equals my daughters will miss out like thousands of others being in the year group 11 they will leave education next year and miss out.
Please treat all girls as equals the parents pay national insurance yet our NHS does not give anything in return to help these children.
